item.title: Science_Journalism_Feature
item.dc:creator: Steph Gemmell
item.description: This piece is the final feature story I wrote for science journalism in spring 2020.

item.title: GW Research Showcase 2021 Poster
item.dc:creator: Steph Gemmell
item.description: I had the opportunity to present my senior thesis research through the Enosinian Scholars Program at GW's 2021 Research Showcase. This poster provides an overview of my research topic and what I found!

item.title: Data Journalism: 2020 Campaign Events by Candidate and State
item.dc:creator: Steph Gemmell
item.description: Here's an analysis showing the presidential candidates with the most campaign events during the 2020 election, in addition to a breakdown of the top 5 states where candidates hosted the most events.

item.title: Data Journalism: Consumer Complaints - Untimely Responses
item.dc:creator: Steph Gemmell
item.description: Here's an analysis of consumer complaints from March 2020 to December 2020 that did not receive timely responses. Source: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau
